Agreed on the 'waitress' thing--that made my antennae
go up. 

And I'm not so sure about the guy being from
Okinawa...??

--- Kitsuno <samurai-listowner@...>
wrote:

> I dont have any issues with the writing style or
> content, although I 
> am not an editor - my only thought is pretty simple
> - I dont know if 
> I would use the word "restaurant", it doesnt fit.
> Same with the 
> word "waitress".  Maybe you should describe her a
> little the way you 
> did the samurai (An important looking man with a
> long and short sword 
> tied to his waist...) rather than just call her a
> "waitress". Not to 
> mention the "waitress waiting" sentence is a bit
> awkward.
> 
> 
>
